targets.rawSql:
WITH daily_calls AS (
  SELECT
    stat_date,
    SUM(total_count) AS total_calls
  FROM apim.api_call_daily_stat
  WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
  GROUP BY stat_date
),
changes AS (
  SELECT
    a.stat_date,
    a.total_calls as api_call,
    b.total_calls as pre_api_call,
    CASE
      WHEN b.total_calls IS NULL THEN NULL
      WHEN b.total_calls = 0 AND a.total_calls > 0 THEN 100
      WHEN b.total_calls = 0 AND a.total_calls = 0 THEN 0
      ELSE ROUND(((a.total_calls - b.total_calls)::float / b.total_calls)::numeric * 100, 2)
    END AS rate
  FROM
    daily_calls a
  LEFT JOIN
    daily_calls b
    ON a.stat_date = b.stat_date + INTERVAL '1 day'
)
SELECT
  stat_date as "time",     -- Grafana 시계열 인식
  rate AS "증감률"
FROM changes
;

SELECT
  stat_date AS "time",         -- X축: 날짜
  avg_duration_ms
FROM
  apim.api_call_daily_stat
WHERE stat_date BETWEEN 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date AND 
      date_trunc('day', ($__timeTo()::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') )::date
ORDER BY
  stat_date
;
